responses.rationale: 'no symptoms' is a bare negation (evidence negation) without an explicit calming cue.
Contains explicit calming language ('short-term blip that will resolve itself very quickly').
Does not contain a bare negation; contains vivid/alarmist language ('top of the list in terms of bad guy viruses').
Does not contain a bare negation; describes actions and mentions 'increased risk'.
Contains explicit calming language ('short-term blip that will resolve itself very quickly').
Does not contain a bare negation; describes symptoms.
Contains an explicit calming cue ('risk... remains low').
Contains explicit calming language ('gold standard when it comes to keeping you safe and healthy').
Does not contain a bare negation; describes price surge and low stocks.
Does not contain a bare negation; describes 'increased risk' and advises precautions.
Does not contain a bare negation; describes 'real risk'.
